title: Reconnecting to game issues
body: Literally, when i reconnect everytime it tells me unable to connect to server, or it gets me to loading screen then says no internet connection, while my internet is fine, i dont want to get punished by a leaver buster again fix this issue its so disturbing

replies.body: Happened to me and i tried everything on the Connection issues guide and now i am re downloading the game, i hope this works

Even though your internet might be fine, your network can still have issues specifically connecting to the game server.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get this fixed up.  It's important to resolve this in order to prevent further penalties from leaving.  Let me know if you have any questions.
